verbs.description: [ARG0: A number of GOP lawmakers] [ARGM-TMP: on Monday] [V: expressed] [ARG1: outrage at President Trump ’s “ zero - tolerance ” policy of separating immigrant children from their parents at the U.S .- Mexico border]

A number of GOP lawmakers on Monday expressed outrage at [ARG0: President Trump ’s] “ zero - tolerance ” policy of [V: separating] [ARG1: immigrant children] [ARG2: from their parents] [ARGM-LOC: at the U.S .- Mexico border]
